data.title: Sample size only
data.text:
I like a good cup of coffee and a lot of it.  I always ask for the Big Gulp size.  At Taza the largest size is a Starbucks small.  2.85 is a lot of cash for a sample size coffee.  

The coffee itself is very good - bold and strong but not bitter.   Some very  decorative donuts and other pastries looked good but I didn't try any of these.

The 2 people working were very friendly.  Very small place with no public restrooms and I didn't see much social going on as I and one lady behind me were the only ones there late on a Saturday morning.

What's up with a coffee shop not opening until 8am?  Most people have to be at work by 8 so stopping by for a quick caffeine fix here may not be an option.

If I rated on the coffee alone this place would be a 5 star but subtract 1 for only serving samples and another for outpricing Starbucks.

data.title: Fantastic cappucinos
data.text: The best coffee we've had in America, made to high Italian standards. Some biscotti would have made it perfect. No restrooms, unfortunately, so don't drink too many cappuccinos!
